data.title: Private Postsecondary Education
data.meta_description: There is a $10 non-refundable fee associated with each transcript request. Please follow this link (ppsepayment.az.gov) and select For Transcripts to pay the fee online.
data.text:
Student Records Request Information

AZPPSE ONLY HAS TRANSCRIPTS FROM CLOSED SCHOOLS FOR STUDENTS WHO ATTENDED PRIVATE POSTSECONDARY INSTITUTION'S CAMPUSES LOCATED IN ARIZONA

For Student Transcript Request

1. Check the Closed School List to make sure AZPPSE maintains the records for the institution from which the student graduated. Click on the link in Column C to begin the process of ordering an education verification.

If Column C is blank, there are no student records for the closed institution

Do not pay for a transcript if you went to a closed school campus located outside of Arizona, in a different state, EVEN IF THE SCHOOL'S MAIN CAMPUS WAS IN ARIZONA

2. If Column C contains a link to AZPPSE, you will be taken to the transcript payment site where you will be prompted to pay a required $10 non-refundable fee for the education verification.

3. Email [email protected] with the following:

Copy of the receipt for payment

Name of Institution you attended

4. Once received, the Records Administrator will email you a link to a Docusign form that must be completed in order to begin the search process.

5. Please be advised that the processing time can range from one to six weeks. Requests are completed in the order in which they are received. The State Board cannot guarantee that a student record can be found for every student. All requests will receive a response with results should proper contact information be provided.

For Education Verification Requests

1. Check the Closed School List to make sure AZPPSE maintains the records for the institution from which the student graduated. Click on the link in Column C to begin the process of ordering an education verification.

If Column C is blank, there are no student records for the closed institution

Do not pay for an education verification if the student went to a closed school campus located outside of Arizona, in a different state, EVEN IF THE SCHOOL'S MAIN CAMPUS WAS IN ARIZONA

2. If Column C contains a link to AZPPSE, you will be taken to the transcript payment site where you will be prompted to pay a required $10 non-refundable fee for the education verification.

3. Email [email protected] with the following:

Copy of the receipt for payment

Education verification request

Signed release from the student authorizing 3rd party to obtain requested information.

4. Please be advised that the processing time can range from one to six weeks. Education verification requests are completed in the order in which they are received. The State Board cannot guarantee that a student record can be found for every student. All requests will receive a response with results should proper contact information be provided.

5. Company check (3rd party requests only) or money order will be accepted if made out to AZPPSE and mailed to the address below:

AZPPSE, 1740 W. Adams. St, Suite 3008, Phoenix, AZ 85007
